pytealutils.storage.storage.global_get_else(key: <TealType.bytes: 1>, default: pyteal.Expr) → pyteal.Expr

Returns the result of a global storage MaybeValue if it exists, else return a default value

pytealutils.storage.storage.global_must_get(key: <TealType.bytes: 1>) → pyteal.Expr

Returns the result of a global storage MaybeValue if it exists, else Assert and fail the program

pytealutils.storage.storage.local_get_else(acct: <TealType.uint64: 0>, key: <TealType.bytes: 1>, default: pyteal.Expr) → pyteal.Expr

Returns the result of a local storage MaybeValue if it exists, else return a default value

pytealutils.storage.storage.local_must_get(acct: <TealType.uint64: 0>, key: <TealType.bytes: 1>) → pyteal.Expr

Returns the result of a loccal storage MaybeValue if it exists, else Assert and fail the program
